subject: Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Maggie Dixon Classic has found a home at Madison Square Garden.The second Maggie Dixon Classic will be played Dec. 8. It will be the first women’s basketball doubleheader at the Garden since 1981. Rutgers will play Army in one game, and Duke will face Pittsburgh. Dixon died April 6, 2006, of arrhythmia, probably caused by an enlarged heart. Her death came three weeks after the end of her first season as the coach at Army.
